Uses of Class
iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.wrapper.CK_MECHANISM

Packages that use CK_MECHANISM
iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.wrapper This package contains the first (lowest) Java layer of the PKCS#11 wrapper. 
 

Uses of CK_MECHANISM in iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.wrapper
 

Methods in iaik.pkcs.pkcs11.wrapper with parameters of type CK_MECHANISM

          C_SignInit initializes a signature (private key encryption) operation, where the signature is (will be) an appendix to the data, and plaintext cannot be recovered from the signature.
